trans-unit.source: Specifies how to draw the gradient outside a gradient brush's gradient vector or space.
trans-unit.target: Especifica como desenhar um gradiente fora do espaço ou vetor de gradiente de um pincel de gradiente.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows the available spread methods and their effect on <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush>.
trans-unit.target: A ilustração a seguir mostra os métodos de propagação disponíveis e seus efeitos em <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> e <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush>.

trans-unit.source: The red line indicates the gradient space.
trans-unit.target: A linha vermelha indica o espaço de gradiente.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> defines its gradient space with its <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> define seu espaço de gradiente com seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush> defines its gradient space with its <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.Center%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.RadiusX%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.RadiusY%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush> define seu espaço de gradiente com seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.Center%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.RadiusX%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.RadiusY%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The color values at the ends of the gradient vector fill the remaining space.
trans-unit.target: Os valores de cor nas extremidades do vetor de gradiente preenchem o espaço restante.

trans-unit.source: The gradient is repeated in the reverse direction until the space is filled.
trans-unit.target: O gradiente é repetido na direção inversa até o espaço ser preenchido.

trans-unit.source: The gradient is repeated in the original direction until the space is filled.
trans-unit.target: O gradiente é repetido na direção original até o espaço ser preenchido.
